claim().details: The beneficiary must be able to receive native tokens.

destinationGasLimit(uint32,uint256).details: If there is no stored destinationGasOverhead, 0 is used. This is useful in the case      the ISM deployer wants to subsidize the overhead gas cost. Then, can specify the gas oracle      they want to use with the destination domain, but set the overhead to 0.

params._destinationDomain: The domain of the message's destination chain.
params._gasLimit: The amount of destination gas to pay for. This is only for application gas usage as      the gas usage for the mailbox and the ISM is already accounted in the DomainGasConfig.gasOverhead

returns.gasPrice: The gas price on the remote chain.
returns.tokenExchangeRate: The exchange rate of the remote native token quoted in the local native token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payForGas(bytes32,uint32,uint256,address.details: Overpayment will result in a refund of native tokens to the _refundAddress. Callers should be aware that this may present reentrancy issues.

params._destinationDomain: The domain of the message's destination chain.
params._gasLimit: The amount of destination gas to pay for.
params._messageId: The ID of the message to pay for.
params._refundAddress: The address to refund any overpayment to.

params.message: The message passed from the Mailbox.dispatch() call
params.metadata: The metadata required for the hook

params.message: The message passed from the Mailbox.dispatch() call
params.metadata: The metadata required for the hook

returns._0: Quoted payment for the postDispatch call

params._destinationDomain: The domain of the message's destination chain.
params._gasLimit: The amount of destination gas to pay for.

returns._0: The amount of native tokens required to pay for interchain gas.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._configs: An array of configs including the remote domain and gas oracles to set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

beneficiary().notice: The benficiary that can receive native tokens paid into this contract.

claim().notice: Transfers the entire native token balance to the beneficiary.

destinationGasConfigs(uint32).notice: Destination domain => gas oracle and overhead gas amount.

destinationGasLimit(uint32,uint256).notice: Returns the stored destinationGasOverhead added to the _gasLimit.

getExchangeRateAndGasPrice(uint32).notice: Gets the token exchange rate and gas price from the configured gas oracle for a given destination domain.

hookType().notice: Returns an enum that represents the type of hook

payForGas(bytes32,uint32,uint256,address.notice: Deposits msg.value as a payment for the relaying of a message to its destination chain.

postDispatch(bytes,bytes).notice: Post action after a message is dispatched via the Mailbox

quoteDispatch(bytes,bytes).notice: Compute the payment required by the postDispatch call

quoteGasPayment(uint32,uint256).notice: Quotes the amount of native tokens to pay for interchain gas.

setDestinationGasConfigs((uint32,(addres.notice: Sets the gas oracles for remote domains specified in the config array.

supportsMetadata(bytes).notice: Returns whether the hook supports metadata
